title: Identity & Access Management
description: Master Amazon Web Services fundamentals and become cloud-certified with hands-on labs and real-world projects.
features: Hands-on Labs with Real AWS Services
Small Batch Size for Better Learning
Overview: The AWS Cloud Practitioner course provides a foundational understanding of Amazon Web Services, cloud concepts, security, pricing models, and core AWS services.
This course is designed for beginners who want to start a career in cloud computing and prepare for AWS certification.
